channel.title: Super Mario 64 on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Super Mario 64 on PacoChan's Website

item.title: Finished a Super Mario 64 save editor
item.description: Time ago I did a save editor for Super Mario 64, but it was exclusive for Windows and I never published it. I decided to rewrite it from scratch, improve it, and make it cross-platform.

item.title: Super Mario 64 - Save Editor
item.description: This is a Super Mario 64 cross-platform save editor. It is compatible with saves of the Nintendo 64 version and the PC port.

item.title: Super Mario 64 - PC Port
item.description: I did several contributions for the PC port of Super Mario. The biggest of them was the Direct3D 11 renderer.

item.title: Super Mario 64 (Nintendo 64)
item.description: I started this project long ago but I abandoned it. I won’t resume it, mainly because three reasons…
